Package com.metal.kit.vapor.characters

Class Guard

java.lang.Object
com.metal.kit.vapor.characters.Character
com.metal.kit.vapor.characters.Enemy
com.metal.kit.vapor.characters.Guard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Playable
public class Guard extends Enemy
The Guard class represents an enemy guard in the game.

A guard is a mobile enemy that can detect a player within a specific area. When the player is detected, the guard triggers an alert sound and begins pursuing the player within its detection range. The guard also has animations for its movement and idle states.

The guard patrols a defined area and is capable of detecting a player when they enter its detection radius. If the player is detected, the guard will trigger an alert and chase after the player. If the player is not detected, the guard continues patrolling in its designated zone.

See Also:

  • DetectionManager
  • GameConfigManager

  • Constructor Details

    • Guard

      public Guard(String name, float x, float y, int health, int damage, float speed, float zoneX, float zoneY, float zoneWidth, float zoneHeight, float detectionDistance, float detectionRadius, float detectionDirection)
      Constructor to initialize a guard with basic parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the guard.
      x - The initial X position of the guard.
      y - The initial Y position of the guard.
      health - The initial health of the guard.
      damage - The damage dealt by the guard.
      speed - The movement speed of the guard.
      zoneX - The X position of the guard's patrol zone.
      zoneY - The Y position of the guard's patrol zone.
      zoneWidth - The width of the guard's patrol zone.
      zoneHeight - The height of the guard's patrol zone.
      detectionDistance - The distance at which the guard can detect the player.
      detectionRadius - The angular radius within which the guard can detect the player.
      detectionDirection - The direction of detection for the guard, expressed in degrees.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Player player, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map, float delta)
      Updates the guard's state on every frame. This method checks if the player is detected. If the player is detected, the guard triggers the alert and pursues the player. If the player is not detected, the guard continues patrolling within its defined zone.
      Overrides:
      update in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      player - The player to detect and pursue.
      map - The game map used to check for collisions.
      delta - The time elapsed since the last update (in seconds).

    • move

      public void move(float delta, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map)
      Moves the guard within its patrol zone. The guard moves horizontally within the specified zone defined by zoneX, zoneY, zoneWidth, and zoneHeight. The guard changes direction when it reaches the zone boundaries.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Playable
      Overrides:
      move in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      delta - The time elapsed since the last update (in seconds).
      map - The game map used to check for collisions during movement.

    • triggerAlert

      public void triggerAlert()
      Triggers the alert sound when the player is detected by the guard. The alert sound will only be played once for each detection event.
      Overrides:
      triggerAlert in class Enemy

    • resetAlert

      public void resetAlert()
      Resets the alert state, indicating that the alert has been lifted. This method is called when the player exits the detection range or when the alert needs to be reset.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Releases the resources used by the guard, including the alert sound. This method is called when the guard is destroyed or when the application exits.
      Overrides:
      dispose in class Enemy
